1199.name: Dur WC 3000
1199.Applications: Dur WC 3000 is used in combination with the MAG proces to develope a sharp and rough surface on cutting tools for steel and or concrete sawing and or crushing applications. These particles can be used in combination with medium hard, extra hard and corrosion resistant filler metals that fits the application.
1199.Suitable_For: concrete drilling, earth moving tools, recycling bars and hammers, cutting applications, sawing steel and concrete, deepsea wrack sawing, mixing paddles, scraper blades, mining etc....
